document.full_text: the tampa bay lightning completed a shock 4-0 sweep of eastern top seeds washington on wednesday, while boston and san jose each took 3-0 series leads to move one win away from reaching the conference finals.
document.title: lightning sweep caps as boston, san jose go up 3-0
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay lightning completed a shock 4-0 sweep of eastern top seeds washington on wednesday, while boston and san jose each took 3-0 series leads to move one win away from reaching the conference finals.
